content: remove hot dishes from the oven it is only meant to set hot dishes on after they are done cooking -cotton will scorch at 450 degrees f so if you have been cooking a dish at temperatures hotter than 400 f please wait several minutes for the pot to cool down before setting it on this trivet -only use cotton yarn for this project never use acrylic yarn for hot pads because it will melt -mid-round color changes will be made by pulling a loop of the new color through the final 2 loops of a single_crochet double_crochet or treble_crochet stitch or the last 3 loops of a half_double_crochet stitch color changes at the beginning of a new round can be done with a chainless starting method -chain-1 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch -slip stitches do not count as stitches unless otherwise noted
